pairing_description.message: Please enter this passcode in the Enpass Assistant to authenticate the browser and set up a connection between the browser and the Enpass app.

pairing_pin_error_description.message: The passcode you entered in the Enpass Assistant did not match the passcode visible on the browser.

context_menu_info.message: If enabled, Enpass will appear as an option in the context menu when you right-click on webpages.

option_record_error.message: Not able to capture the shortcut.

error_static_highlight.message: Enpass Assistant is unable to connect with the Enpass app.

error_static_description.message: Please make sure that Enpass app is installed, running in the background, and also the extension is enabled from the Enpass browser settings. If you still encounter any issue, please reach out to our support team at $webpage$.

cb_error_static_description.message: You need to connect the Enpass extension to the main Enpass app to use autofill service. Click 'Connect' to continue. If you still encounter any issue, please reach out to our support team at $webpage$.

error_static_highlight_3.message: If found, you will be prompted to open Enpass.

error_setup_description.message: Before using Enpass Assistant, you first need to set up the Enpass app with a master password.
error_setup_description.description: When master password is not setup by user

error_log_highlight.message: Enpass app has denied access to data.

error_log_highlight_8.message: Enpass app has stopped communication with the extension.

error_log_highlight7.message: Oops! This browser has been blocked to make connection with Enpass.
error_log_highlight7.description: Message when user rejected connection to browser 3 times for unknown browser

error_log_code_1.message: Unable to fetch process information of connected browser.

error_log_code_2.message: The installed Enpass extension for Browser seems to be unauthorized. Please make sure you have installed it from the legitimate source.

error_log_code_3.message: Browser requesting the data is not code signed.

error_log_code_4.message: Some other user(s) in this system is already connected to Enpass app on specific port.

error_log_code_7.message: This is because you have 3-times rejected the connection request made by the browser. You can unblock the browser from Enpass Settings > Browser > Browser Authorization > Review Browser > Find the browser name, tap on Remove, and done.
error_log_code_7.description: Message when user rejected connection to browser 3 times for unknown browser

error_log_code_8.message: Connecting browser is not in foreground. It seems some application other than the connecting browser is in focus.

share_string.message: You can share the following diagnostics with us at $email$.

error_update_highlight.message: Extension is unable to connect with Enpass

error_update_description.message: You are using an older version of Enpass. The extension requires Enpass version 6.0.0 or later be installed first.

dialog_save.message: Do you want to save this Login in Enpass?

dialog_update.message: Should Enpass update existing item for this site?

link_shortcut_change.description: Redirect user to global extensions shortcut page for changing shortcut

info_to_enter_new_shortcut.description: Info to ask user to enter a new shortcut in the textbox

label_inline_toggle.description: Settings label to toggle Inline Autofill Popup Menu

label_autofill_onload.description: Setting to toggle autofill on page load

info_autofill_onload.message: If enabled, Enpass will fill the credentials automatically on page load, provided there is a single matching item for that webpage. Otherwise, you need to manually select the item allowing Enpass to supply any information to the website.
info_autofill_onload.description: info to toggle autofill on page load

label_enpass_as_default.description: Setting to override default browser password manager

info_enpass_as_default.message: Set Enpass as default password manager.
info_enpass_as_default.description: Info override default browser password manager

label_menu_appearance.description: Setting to change theme of Inline Autofill Popup Menu

label_inline_menu_blocked_page_list.description: Setting to show list of pages where Inline Autofill Popup Menu is blocked

info_inline_menu_blocked_page_list.message: URLs on which you don't want Enpass Inline Autofill Menu to appear.
info_inline_menu_blocked_page_list.description: info to show list of pages where inline menu is blocked

placeholder_add_blocked_url.description: Placeholder to depict pattern to add url

welcome_main_header.message: Enpass browser extension has been installed.

welcome_main_header_update.message: Enpass browser extension has been updated.

welcome_subtitle.message: Click $icon$ in your toolbar to access Enpass anytime.

welcome_icon_info_link.description: Icon not visible on extension install.

welcome_get_started_link.description: Link to get started with enpass.

welcome_set_default_manager.message: Set Enpass as default password manager
welcome_set_default_manager.description: Asking to set default password manager

welcome_set_default_manager_info.message: For better autofill experience on this browser, we recommend to set Enpass as your default password manager.
welcome_set_default_manager_info.description: Explaining why to set default password manager

error_static_app_not_found.message: We could not find the Enpass desktop app installed on your computer. Please make sure all of the following instructions are completed.

instruction_app_installed.message: Enpass App is installed on your device and is running in the background.

instruction_extension_enabled.message: The extension is enabled from Browser settings in the Enpass app.

ques_desktop_app_required.message: Why Enpass desktop app is required?

label_autofill_menu_info.message: A popup menu with autofill suggestions will appear if a login, credit card or identity is detected on the web page.
